segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I feel a wave of worry wash over me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so engrossed in her task, drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the overflow from the sink is creating such a sad mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water ruining the cabinets and floorâ€”it breaks my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, standing in it, and it just feels tragic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls while grabbing those cookies, it'll be devastating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting eagerly adds to the poignant scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent fun in the midst of potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside highlights the sorrow inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them to prevent the heartache.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This unnoticed chaos could lead to real tears soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
